TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CategoryAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定当属性或事件显示在一个设置为“按分类顺序”模式的 控件中时，用于对属性或事件分组的类别的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the category in which to group the property or event when displayed in a control set to Categorized mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当将控件中的属性或事件列出到模式时，指示要与关联的属性或事件关联的类别 。A indicates the category to associate the associated property or event with, when listing properties or events in a control set to mode. 如果尚未 应用于属性或事件，则 会将其与 " **杂项** " 类别关联。If a has not been applied to a property or event, the associates it with the **Misc** category. 可以通过在的构造函数中指定类别的名称，为任何名称创建一个新类别 。A new category can be created for any name by specifying the name of the category in the constructor for the . 属性指示该属性表示的类别的名称。The property indicates the name of the category that the attribute represents. 属性还提供了类别名称的透明本地化。The property also provides transparent localization of category names. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 `MyImage` 属性。The following example creates the `MyImage` property. 属性具有两个属性： 和 。The property has two attributes: a and a . [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例获取的类别 `MyImage` 。The next example gets the category for `MyImage`. 首先，该代码获取一个， 其中包含对象的所有属性。First, the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下来，代码将索引到中 以获取 `MyImage` 。Next, the code indexes into the to get `MyImage`. 然后，它将返回此属性的属性并将其保存在变量中 `attributes` 。Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the variable `attributes`. 然后，该示例通过 从检索 ，并将其写入控制台屏幕来打印该类别。The example then prints the category by retrieving from the , and writing it to the console screen. [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

para.span: 如果使用的类别名称不是预定义的名称，并且要本地化类别名称，则必须重写 方法。

span.span: If you use category names other than the predefined names, and you want to localize your category names, you must override the method.
The class defines the following common categories:
Category
Description

description.span: 与可用操作相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to available actions.

description.span: 与实体显示方式相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to how an entity appears.

description.span: 与实体的作用方式相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to how an entity acts.

description.span: 与数据和数据源管理相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to data and data source management.

description.span: 分组到默认类别中的属性。

span.span: Properties that are grouped in a default category.

description.span: 仅在设计时可用的属性。

span.span: Properties that are available only at design time.

description.span: 与拖放操作相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to drag-and-drop operations.
Properties related to focus.

description.span: 与格式设置相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to formatting.
Properties related to the keyboard.
Properties related to layout.
Properties related to the mouse.

description.span: 与顶级窗体的窗口样式相关的属性。

span.span: Properties related to the window style of top-level forms.

para.span: 有关更多信息，请参阅特性。

span.span: For more information, see Attributes.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the category name Default.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string category) cil managed

span.span: The name of the category.

summary.span: 使用指定的类别名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified category name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为参数提供的名称 `category` 是预定义的类别名称之一，则该名称将自动由属性进行本地化 。If the name you provide for the `category` parameter is one of the predefined category names, the name will be automatically localized by the property. 如果您提供的名称不是预定义的类别名称，并且您不重写该 方法以提供本地化名称，则不会对该类别名称进行本地化。If the name you provide is not a predefined category name, and you do not override the method to provide a localized name, the category name will not be localized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性 在第一次访问时，将调用以获取类别的本地化名称。This property calls to get the localized name of the category the first time it is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetLocalizedString(string value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetLocalizedString (value As String) As String
abstract member GetLocalizedString : string -> string override this.GetLocalizedString : string -> string

param.name: value
param.span: 要查阅的类别的标识符。

span.span: The identifer for the category to look up.

summary.span: 查阅指定类别的本地化名称。

span.span: Looks up the localized name of the specified category.

returns.span: 类别的本地化名称；如果本地化名称不存在，则为 。

span.span: The localized name of the category, or if a localized name does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在第一次访问时调用此方法，以便查找指定类别的本地化名称。The property calls this method the first time it is accessed to look up the localized name for the specified category.

para.span: 重写此方法以将您自己的本地化名称添加到类别中。

span.span: Override this method to add your own localized names to categories.

para.span: 如果本地化字符串可用于给定的值，则该方法应返回它。

span.span: If a localized string is available for the given value, the method should return it.

para.span: 否则，调用基类的方法， 使基类对字符串进行本地化。

span.span: Otherwise, call the base class's method to let the base class localize the string.
